page.title: 03Local News (1), Bowness.
page.content: { The Braithwaite Fold Complex On the car park at Braithwaite Fold a company wishes to build a{Leisure}and {Timeshare Complex.}There would be a leisure pool,ice rink,squash courts, bars,restaurant and 237 flats. This has caused a lot of{controversy,}many people think it would be out of place as it would be as long as the{QE2}and as high as{5 double decker buses. Local traders think it would take trade away from them but the{Tourist {Board}think it would attract more tourists. {Friends of the Lake District}think the area should be made into a{Country {Park.} Meanwhile the discussions and arguments go on.
